markdownRemark.html:
The Asymetrics · The Asymetrics Present: Fabio Modi - Ortigia Selection

Direct Links: Soundcloud / Youtube

Fabio Modi is a resident of the island of Ortigia in Sicily, and the co-founder of the "OSS" Ortigia Sound System Festival.

A collector of vinyls, cassettes and vintage hi-fi, Fabio digs into Electronic Music, Funk, Drum & Bass, Afro Future, Italodisco, and much more...

He has launched the SanRoccoSound label in 2008, dedicated to cosmic sounds and Nu-Disco, and currently collaborates with Sazzah Studio records.

Tracklist

Follow Fabio Modi on Instagram / Soundcloud

Stay Fresh, and Keep it real !

frontmatter.author: Asymetrics
frontmatter.teaser: From Sicily with love ! Fabio Modi, the man behind the great Ortigia Sound System Festival, shares a sweet, 100% vinyl selection.
frontmatter.title: Fabio Modi - Ortigia Selection
